backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining jobs, contact requests, user profiles, and admin‑protected CRUD operations with authorization checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two branding-related features and their associated components and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of many frontend files covering routing, UI components, hooks, branding, and copy modules.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark modes with global border/background settings.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file loading the React app and referencing the generated favicon path.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with all site routes wrapped in SiteLayout and includes admin route protection.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminRoute: Checks Internet Identity login and admin permissions, gating access to admin pages with appropriate UI states.
frontend/src/components/admin/ContactReq: Displays contact requests in a table with loading, error, and empty states using React Query.
frontend/src/components/admin/JobEditorD: Dialog for adding or editing jobs with form handling, category mapping, and backend mutations.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthButtons: Renders a login/logout button using Internet Identity, handling authentication state and errors.
frontend/src/components/common/CompanyDe: Displays company email and address using brand configuration values.
frontend/src/components/common/EmptyStat: Shows an icon, title, description, and optional action for empty or error states.
frontend/src/components/contact/ContactF: Implements a contact form with fields, validation, success/error alerts, and submission via mutateAsync.
frontend/src/components/contact/Floating: Floating WhatsApp button that opens a prefilled chat using brand config details.
frontend/src/components/contact/WhatsApp: A reusable WhatsApp support button that opens a prefilled chat message.
frontend/src/components/jobs/FeaturedJob: Fetches and displays paginated active jobs with loading, error, and empty states.
frontend/src/components/jobs/JobCard.tsx: Card component showing job details and an Apply Now action.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer with company info, links, social icons, and contact details using brand and copy config.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Header with navigation, admin checks, mobile menu, and auth controls.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Overall site layout including header, footer, and floating WhatsApp button.
frontend/src/config/brand.ts: Centralized branding, company info, contact details, social links, and document metadata.
frontend/src/config/krStaffing.ts: Legacy config wrapper that re-exports values from brandConfig for backward compatibility.
frontend/src/content/copy.ts: Defines UI copy text for the site including hero text, sections, testimonials, about info, and contact form strings, using brandConfig where needed.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminJobs.ts: Provides React Query hooks for admin job operations like add, update, activate, deactivate, seeding jobs, and fetching contact requests.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity React context and provider for authentication state, login, logout, and identity restoration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains React Query hooks for public and user-specific actions such as fetching active jobs, profiles, submitting contact forms, and checking admin status.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with custom CSS variables for themes and base styles, including dark mode tokens.
frontend/src/lib/applyNow.ts: Builds and opens a Google Form apply URL with optional prefilled jobTitle and city parameters.
frontend/src/lib/categories.ts: Defines job category metadata and helper functions to look up categories and labels from backend JobCategory values.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with company info, trust/compliance details, HR contact, roles, platforms, and sample document handlers.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin dashboard for managing jobs, seeding examples, editing entries, and viewing contact requests.
frontend/src/pages/CategoriesPage.tsx: Displays a grid of job categories and navigates to filtered job listings on click.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Shows company details, WhatsApp support, and a contact form for user inquiries.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Provides the homepage with a hero search form, popular searches, categories, featured jobs, and contact options.
frontend/src/pages/JobsPage.tsx: Lists jobs with keyword, city, and category filtering, pagination, and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicyPage.tsx: Displays the privacy policy content with heading and formatted paragraphs.
frontend/src/pages/TermsPage.tsx: Shows the terms and conditions content with headings and paragraph formatting.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routes), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom colors, radii, shadows, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current requirements, UI/UX goals, branding rules, known issues, and asset needs for KR Staffing.
